message: Let's be practical, Bob. Take this offer and we both walk away with something.
I think a 50/50 split is fair, considering the money will be worth less in the next round.
I understand the situation, Bob, but a 50/50 split isn't in my best interest. This offer is much fairer considering the depreciation in value for you.
Let's split the difference this time, Alice.  I'll take 4000, you take 6000.  This is a fair compromise considering the inflation.
